Package io.github.ai4ci.config

package io.github.ai4ci.config
Provides configuration interfaces for epidemiological simulations and experiments.

Contains:

  • Core experiment configuration (TestParameters, ExperimentConfiguration)
  • Setup and parameterization classes SetupConfiguration
  • Execution control parameters ExecutionConfiguration, ExecutionFacet
  • Batch processing configurations BatchConfiguration

Key features:

  • Immutable configuration objects using Immutables library
  • JSON serialization/deserialization support
  • Modular design with facets and modifications
Author:
Rob Challen
